document_data.name: Embryn Crownsilver
document_data.mainbody: '''Embryn Crownsilver''' was a member of the [[House Crownsilver|Crownsilver]] noble house of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], Embryn pledged allegiance to [[Vangerdahast]] as the Regent of Cormyr.
document_data.Description: Embryn wore a jeweled [[tunic]] with a pair of [[Wikipedia:Cloth of gold|cloth of gold]] [[breeches]], and a half-[[cloak]].
